#   For RED array
#   Based on Lab measurements in 2/2018 and 3/2017
#   Includes bad and noisy pixels (s/n < 20)
#
# column 1: spaxel number (1-25, numbered left to right in array)
# column 2: spexel number (1-16, numbered bottom to top in array)
